actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Small Business
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to increase the maximum allowable compensation and travel expenses for experts and consultants.

summary.text: Amends the Small Business Act to increase, to the maximum amounts payable under the executive schedule for Federal employees, the maximum allowable compensation and travel expenses for experts and consultants employed by the Administrator of the Small Business Administration.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to increase the maximum allowable compensation and travel expenses for experts and consultants.
